name: FK Partizan TV - Kodi/XBMC plugin
tagline: Kodi plugin for FK Partizan TV
body:
### About

Kodi/XBMC plugin for watching [FK Partizan](http://partizan.rs/) official TV station.
FK Partizan is part of [JSD Partizan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JSD_Partizan)  (Yugoslav Sports Association Partizan).

### How to install
This plugin (and some other) may be installed from [LazyRobot Kodi plugin repository](https://github.com/zchira/zchiraKodi/raw/master/repository.lazyrobot.zip).
Download repository archive and instal it from Kodi (Video->Add on->Install from Zip).

![](http://pfk.yolasite.com/resources/partizanwallrise2.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
